name: Battle Smith
description: Battle Smiths blend martial prowess with arcane ingenuity, fighting alongside a loyal Steel Defender constructed through magical engineering.

3.name: Battle Ready
3.description: You gain proficiency with martial weapons. When you attack with a magic weapon, you can use your Intelligence modifier instead of Strength or Dexterity for the attack and damage rolls.

3.name: Steel Defender
3.description: You construct a Steel Defender, a loyal magical companion that acts on your initiative. It can move and use its reaction each round, and it can take actions when you command it.

3.name: Battle Smith Spells
3.description: You always have certain spells prepared at specific artificer levels.

5.name: Extra Attack
5.description: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

9.name: Arcane Jolt
9.description: When you hit a target with a magic weapon attack or your Steel Defender hits a creature, you can deal extra force damage or restore hit points to a creature you can see.

15.name: Improved Defender
15.description: Your Steel Defender becomes more resilient and dangerous, gaining additional damage and improved reactions.
